body_html: Update: I used @alykhantejani's script for some benchmarking and found that batch_size=32 is a good starting point. I want to bind the NNPACK nnp_convolution_inference to see how performance compares for batch_size=1. Then I will pick a final threshold for things and we can get this merged :)
body_text: Update: I used @alykhantejani's script for some benchmarking and found that batch_size=32 is a good starting point. I want to bind the NNPACK nnp_convolution_inference to see how performance compares for batch_size=1. Then I will pick a final threshold for things and we can get this merged :)
body: Update: I used @alykhantejani's script for some benchmarking and found that `batch_size=32` is a good starting point. I want to bind the NNPACK `nnp_convolution_inference` to see how performance compares for `batch_size=1`. Then I will pick a final threshold for things and we can get this merged :)
